snippet.title: Shell Runner - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay and some of the features of Shell Runner, like shell customization options, equipment, and more in this trailer for the top-down tactical shooter hybridized with looter shooter and extraction games. Shell Runner will be available in Steam Early Access on July 15, 2024.

In Shell Runner, welcome to 2045. You are a Shell Runner using lifelike Shells to carry out wet work for anyone willing to pay. But be careful: Lose a Shell on a mission and it's gone - together with all the gear, loot, and Silicon credits you managed to pilfer from other unfortunates living in the shadows of the corps.
